Key Match Events: Jazz Chisholm hit a walk-off ground ball to drive in Anthony Volpe for the winning run
Juan Soto broke his cold streak with a two-run homer in the sixth inning
Pre-Game Insights: The Yankees extended their lead in the American League East to 1.5 games with the win
Manager Aaron Boone relied on Luis Gil, who delivered a strong performance, allowing just one earned run over five innings
Post-Match Reflections: Jazz Chisholm expressed excitement about playing in a playoff atmosphere in the Bronx
Austin Wells made a crucial contribution with a sacrifice fly in the bottom of the 10th inning
Miscellaneous Highlights: The Yankees recorded six strikeouts and four runs in the game
Juan Soto fouled a ball off his right foot just before his homer, but was able to stay in the game
Others: The Yankees now turn their attention to a four-game series against the Boston Red Sox, starting on Thursday night
Nestor Cortes will start for the Yankees in Thursday's matchup against the Red Sox
